text:
- You ready?
- And action.
♪ You gotta dream ♪
I'm living the dream, you guys!
I'm about to tear it up.
♪ From the jump ♪

Girls can do anything
they want to do.

Meg: Being a strong girl
means standing up

for what you believe in
no matter what.

Why fit in when you
were born to stand out?

I'm, like, unique.
I'm one of a kind.

♪ Dream big, dream hard,
dream loud ♪

♪ Dream in technicolor
and dream in sound ♪

♪ You can dream big,
dream deep, dream high ♪
We're capable of so much.

♪ I'm a dreamer,
follow my lead ♪

And we all bring something
important to the table.
Whoo!

♪ No one can stop us
this time ♪

Peyton:
Girls are just as strong

and just as powerful,
and sometimes more.

Sofia:
They're, like, really strong,
empowered young women.
♪ Say what you gotta say ♪
♪ Say what you gotta say ♪
I'm pretty good being me.
That's what I'm talking about.
♪ Say what you gotta say ♪
♪ Say what you gotta say ♪

And cut.
That was incredible.
( laughing )
